__TOC__

== Summary ==

<nowiki>[[File:IconsPage/IconControlCenter2.png]]</nowiki> This page is meant as a way keep track of missing and requested GUIs for administrative tasks in Ubuntu, as part of the discussion in http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=445954. Items from http://ubuntuforums.org/showpost.php?p=1840857&postcount=600 can also be integrated here. Feel free to add things and prettify the page.

== Legend ==

* Task: Simple description of the task to be performed by the GUI

* Provided for: Name of the backend that the GUI will be used to configure

* Progress: Whether there's ongoing development, or partial or complete implementation that can be used, and if positive, links

* Comments: Any additional information
